The Fourth Plate season 4","alt_titles":[{"name":"\u98df\u621f\u306e\u30bd\u30fc\u30de \u795e\u30ce\u76bf","lang":25,"type":"official"},{"name":"Food Wars! The Fourth Plate","lang":7,"type":"synonym"},{"name":"Shokugeki no Souma Season 4","lang":33,"type":"synonym"}],"season":"4","rank":801,"poster":"84\/843599389a01b6044","fanart":"11\/1142512429520dd8df","first_aired":"2019-10-12T04:30:00Z","airs":{"day":"Saturday","time":"12:30 AM","timezone":"Asia\/Tokyo"},"runtime":25,"certification":null,"overview":"Yukihira Souma, who has been honing his cooking skills at his family diner \"Yukihira\" all his life, enters a super elite culinary academy called \"Totsuki Saryo Culinary Academy\". He improves as a chef through interactions with other chefs in and out of the academy but everything changes when Nakiri Azami has taken over the chief in command position at the academy. With the Central Gourmet Organization ruling over the academy, the students are no longer allowed to cook freely. Souma and friends stood against the regime and as a result, they were labeled as rebels of the Academy!

Season of the Advancement Exams arrive. They managed to pass the exams despite some interference but Cenrral Gourmet Organization will stop at nothing! Finally, some of Souma`s friends lose and are sentenced to be expelled! In order to breakthrough this situation, Souma and the remaining rebels challenge new Council members and Azami regime to R\u00e9giment du Cuisine!

The 1st BOUT was won by the rebels with ease but this is only the beginning of the battle to decide their fates. 2nd BOUT is about to begin!
